title: Low cost (2nd cl.)
shortDescription: The cheapest way to travel in an open carriage or a compartment.
description: During the trip, you can easily order refreshments using our mobile app or refresh yourself with free Rajec water.

title: Standard (2nd cl.)
shortDescription: Open space of the ASTRA car, or compartments for 6 passengers. Illy coffee and Rajec water for free. Special kids’ compartment.
description: The Standard comfort class means the opportunity to book a seat in an ASTRA open-space car or in a compartment for 6 passengers. Illy coffee and Rajec water are provided free of charge; as are newspapers and magazines. Our on-board menu with snacks and beverages for affordable prices is also available. Seats are fitted with LCD screens with many forms of entertainment. Passengers with small children will appreciate our special kids’ compartment where our smallest passengers can play and entertain themselves.

title: Standard (PL)
shortDescription: Large seater coach or 6-seater coupe with free Rajec water, breakfast and evening refreshments.
description: In the Standard Class, you can choose between a large car or a 6-seater coupe. On your journey, you will enjoy complimentary Rajec water, daily newspapers, and we also offer complimentary breakfast and evening refreshments. Also take advantage of our on-board menu at bargain prices.

title: Relax (2nd cl.)
shortDescription: Open-space car with leather seats. Illy coffee and Rajec water are provided for free; entertainment portal and Wi-Fi are also available.
description: The Relax comfort class truly means relax. You can book a particular seat in the open-space car with comfortable leather seats, entertainment portal and Wi-Fi. Stewards provide services throughout the journey; Illy coffee and Rajec water are provided for free, as are newspapers and magazines. The on-board menu includes a variety of snacks and beverages for affordable prices.

title: Business (1st cl.)
shortDescription: Premium service, maximum comfort. Above-standard features, leather seats. Priority service by the staff. Rajec water, Illy coffee, juice or Prosecco are provided free of charge.
description: The Business comfort class means premium service and maximum comfort. Above-standard features with leather seats, entertainment portal, Wi-Fi and priority service by our staff. Rajec water, Illy coffee, juice or Bohemia Sekt Brut sparkling wine are provided free of charge, as are newspapers and magazines. Our on-board menu with a variety of snacks and beverages is available. The comfort of the Business class is the best option for everyone who wants to work or relax during their journey with above-standard service.

title: Business (1st cl.)
shortDescription: Travel with first class in large open coaches or in coupe for six people.
description: Air conditioning, 230 V sockets, Wi-Fi connection, bottled water Rajec, Entertainment portal on your own facilities and magazines on self-service shelves.

title: Low cost (2nd cl.)
shortDescription: The cheapest way to travel in an open carriage or a compartment.
description: You can also book a bicycle, stroller or dog transport with this fare. If you're travelling with children under 10, we have separate compartments reserved for you.

title: Private compartment
shortDescription: Travel in your own sleeper compartment for up to 4 people.
description: Enjoy a full night's sleep and comfort in the privacy of your coupe. We will provide you with bed linen, a pillow and a blanket. We will make your morning more enjoyable with a tasty breakfast and fresh coffee.

title: Couchette
shortDescription: Travel comfortably in a sleeper coupe for 6 people.
description:
Take a journey by night train. In the coach you will find bedding, a pillow and a blanket. In the morning we will wake you up with a croissant and coffee.
Our security service will make sure you get a good night's sleep.

title: Berth
shortDescription: Embark on a journey in a spacious sleeping compartment for 4 people.
description: For your comfort, we will prepare a package with bedding, a pillow, and a blanket. And since the morning makes the day, we will prepare a delicious breakfast and fresh coffee.

title: Berth - only women
shortDescription: Reserve a berth in a four-person compartment, designated only for women and women with children up to 10 years old.
description: For your comfort, we will prepare a package with bedding, a pillow, and a blanket. And since the morning makes the day, we will prepare a delicious breakfast and fresh coffee.

title: Private compartment
shortDescription: Travel in your own sleeper compartment for up to 3 people.
description: Enjoy a full night's sleep and comfort in the privacy of your coupe. We will provide you with bed linen, a pillow and a blanket. We will make your morning more enjoyable with a tasty breakfast and fresh coffee.

title: Standard (bus)
shortDescription: A comfortable seat on the lower section of our state-of-the-art double-decker coach at a great price. Complimentary Wi-Fi, entertainment portal, power sockets and toilet.
description: In the Standard class on the lower section of the coach, you can enjoy comfortable seats, touch screens with an entertainment portal, Wi-Fi and electrical outlets for your mobile phones and laptops.

title: Relax (bus)
shortDescription: Extra comfortable seats in the coach section with extra legroom and unique views. Complimentary Wi-Fi, entertainment portal, electrical outlets and toilet.
description: Enjoy unparalleled panoramic views and extra legroom that makes you feel as comfortable as possible with plenty of space for your laptop. Of course, there is Wi-Fi and power outlets for your mobile phones and laptops.

title: Low cost
shortDescription: Travel comfortably at the most affordable price.
description: You can also reserve bicycle, stroller, or pet transport for your journey. If traveling with children under 10, we have a dedicated compartment for you.

title: Standard
shortDescription: Comfort at a great price with the option to order refreshments.
description: The possibility of ordering hot and cold drinks, light snacks, 230 V sockets, Wi-Fi connection, and magazines on self-service shelves.

title: Relax
shortDescription: First-class comfort but without the option to order refreshments.
description: Air conditioning, 230 V sockets, Wi-Fi connection, and magazines on self-service shelves are available.

title: Business
shortDescription: First-class with extra space and individual seats for maximum comfort, free drinks, and the option to order refreshments.
description: Enjoy premium comfort in an open-space environment with the most comfortable and spacious seats, ensuring a calm travel experience with enough room for work and relaxation. Air conditioning, 230 V sockets, Wi-Fi connection, and free bottled Rajec water or orange juice are available, as well as refreshments from the onboard menu.

title: Standard
shortDescription: Settle into a comfortable 6-seat compartment and enjoy free coffee during your journey.
description: Comfortable fabric seats with headrests, Wi-Fi, and a 230 V socket. Your trip will be enhanced by daily newspapers or our entertainment portal, which you can easily access from your own device. Snacks can be easily ordered from the onboard staff or via the mobile app, and you can refresh yourself with free bottled Rajec water or Illy coffee.

title: Sleeping for men and women
shortDescription: Embark on a journey in a spacious 3-person sleeping compartment.
description: For your comfort, we will prepare made-up beds with bedding, a pillow, and a blanket. And because mornings make the day, we will prepare a delicious breakfast and fresh coffee for you.

title: Sleeping for women
shortDescription: Reserve a bed in a 3-person compartment intended only for women and women with children under 10.
description: For your comfort, we will prepare made-up beds with bedding, a pillow, and a blanket. And because mornings make the day, we will prepare a delicious breakfast and fresh coffee for you.

title: - no seat class -
shortDescription: - no seat class -
description: - no seat class -
